file_insights.changes: Added aria-label attribute to IconButton component
file_insights.context: Close button in Audit Details modal/drawer header

patterns_discovered.description: Adding descriptive aria-label to icon-only buttons for screen reader accessibility
patterns_discovered.best_practice: Icon buttons should have aria-label to describe their function to assistive technologies

patterns_discovered.description: Isolated change to one component without requiring changes to related files

gotchas_discovered.detail: CloseIcon without aria-label is not descriptive for screen reader users
gotchas_discovered.solution_applied: Added aria-label='Close details' to clarify button purpose

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully added aria-label to close IconButton in AuditLogPage
approach_outcome.efficiency: Single attempt success - straightforward accessibility fix
approach_outcome.change_scope: Minimal - single attribute addition to existing component

recommendations.recommendation: Audit other icon-only buttons throughout the application for similar missing aria-label attributes
recommendations.rationale: Pattern suggests other icon buttons may lack proper accessibility labels

recommendations.recommendation: Consider standardizing aria-label naming conventions (e.g., 'Close details' vs 'Close modal' vs 'Close')
recommendations.rationale: Consistent labeling improves maintainability and user experience

recommendations.recommendation: Verify aria-label renders correctly with screen readers in the details modal context
recommendations.rationale: Ensures accessibility improvement is functional in real usage scenarios
